StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAllRecrui.ngOrgWhereIsOpen]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SELECT [ORGANIZATION_ID] ,[STATE_CODE] ,[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] ,[MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID] ,[NAME] ,[SHORT_NAME] ,[MCC_CODE] ,[TO_PROD_RECRUITERS] ,[STREET] ,[STREET2] ,[CITY] ,[ZIP_CODE] ,[ISOPEN] ,[DELETED] ,[IS_ASSIGNED] ,[EFFECTIVE_DATE] ,[poc_email] ,[OrgUnitId] ,[rowguid] ,MUD.MUD_ORG_NAME As MUDName ,MUD.MUD_USER_EMAIL As MUDNo..ca.onEmail FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[MUD_USER_DATA] MUD ON MUD.ORG_ID = [dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION].[ORGANIZATION_ID] WHERE [ISOPEN] = 'Y' AND [DELETED] = 'N' ORDER BY [NAME]
